Pipeline tasksÂ¶

In [1]: import geowombat as gw

In [2]: from geowombat.tasks import GeoTask

In [3]: from geowombat.data import l8_224078_20200518_B3, l8_224078_20200518_B4, l8_224078_20200518

In [4]: import xarray as xr

In [5]: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

In [6]: inputs = {'a': l8_224078_20200518, 'b': l8_224078_20200518, 'c': (l8_224078_20200518_B3, l8_224078_20200518_B4), 'd': 'c', 'e': ('a', 'b', 'd')}

In [7]: outputs = {'a': 'mem|r1', 'b': 'mem|r2', 'c': 'mem|r3', 'd': 'mem|mean', 'e': 'mem|stack'}

In [8]: tasks = (('a', gw.norm_diff), ('b', gw.norm_diff), ('c', xr.concat), ('d', xr.DataArray.mean), ('e', xr.concat))

In [9]: func_args = {'a': {'b1': 'green', 'b2': 'red'}, 'b': {'b1': 'blue', 'b2': 'green'}, 'c': {'dim': 'band'}, 'd': {'dim': 'band'}, 'e': {'dim': 'band'}}

In [10]: open_args = {'chunks': 512}

In [11]: config_args = {'sensor': 'bgr', 'nodata': 0, 'scale_factor': 0.0001}

In [12]: task_mean = GeoTask(inputs, outputs, tasks, config_args=config_args, open_args=open_args, func_args=func_args, out_args={})

In [13]: viz = task_mean.visualize()

In [14]: viz.format = 'PNG'

In [15]: viz.render(filename='task_mean', view=False)
Out[15]: 'task_mean.png'

In [16]: fig, ax = plt.subplots(dpi=200)

In [17]: plt.tight_layout(pad=1)
